Class ReversiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReversiController
  • public class ReversiController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a controller that manages the game's process.
    Author:
    Sekyun Oh

    • Method Detail

      • humanTurn

        public boolean humanTurn​(int row,
                         int col)
        humanTurn(row: int, col: int) This function inserts a color at a specific place chosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        row - : the row where you wish to insert "color"
        col - : the col where you wish to insert "color"
        Returns:
        a boolean if there is a legal move for human.

      • computerTurn

        public boolean computerTurn()
        computerTurn() This function inserts a color at a specific place chosen by the computer.
        Returns:
        a String value that indicates a spot where the computer places
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - that's occurred by invalid input.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        isGameOver() This function checks if the game is over or not.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that determines the game is over.

      • winner

        public java.lang.String winner()
        winner() This function finds a winner of the game, but it can be a tie.
        Returns:
        a String value that would be the winner or tie.

      • parseInput

        public int[] parseInput​(java.lang.String input)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        parseInput(input: String) This function converts a character to integer. For example, if the user inputs c5, it returns [3,5] since c == 3.
        Parameters:
        input - from the user.
        Returns:
        int [] that contains a converted input
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - that may be caused by an invalid input.

      • currentStatus

        public void currentStatus()
        currentStatus(row: int, col: int) This function returns a value at a specific place of the board.
        Parameters:
        row - : the row where the color is located in.
        col - : the col where the color is located in.

      • getScore

        public int[] getScore()
        getScore() This function gets each score for the user and computer.
        Returns:
        int[] that contains [user's score, computer's score].
